Aug 2015

Snappy is part of STORM Lab’s eSMAC project I’m working on. It’s an educational modular robot for high school STEM courses.
Baxter the Master Chef
Dec 2014

A video of my class project - Baxter the Master Chef. Baxter’s program is written in Python. It takes a photo of the ham, does some image processing to locate the geometric center of the ham, and then the cutting starts!
A Guide to Writing about Art History with Walter Benjamin
Mar 2014

In my Western Civilization class today, we were introduced to a critique written by Walter Benjamin, a German philosophor who had tremendous influence on 20th century western art and aesthetic theory.
